article: struggling in what president george w. bush calls `` the last phase of diplomacy , '' secretary of state colin powell is trying to convince skeptical governments that only force , not more inspections , will disarm iraq and neutralize president saddam hussein .
abstract: powell makes uphill pitch for u.n. backing to neutralize saddam hussein
